TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RadioButtonState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the visual state of an option button (also known as a radio button) that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The RadioButtonState values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.RadioButton> class. The RadioButtonState values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButtonRenderer.DrawRadioButton%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState CheckedDisabled = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The option button is checked and disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState CheckedHot = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The option button is checked and hot.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState CheckedNormal = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The option button is checked and normal.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState CheckedPressed = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The option button is checked and pressed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState UncheckedDisabled = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The option button is unchecked and disabled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState UncheckedHot = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The option button is unchecked and hot.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState UncheckedNormal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The option button is unchecked and normal.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.RadioButtonState UncheckedPressed = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The option button is unchecked and pressed.
